title.rendered: Sunrise the Premium Floors: Unparalleled Luxury in Karnal’s Historic City

content.rendered:
Sunrise Premium Floors by Signature Global is an exclusive gated community spanning over 6.5 acres in Karnal, offering unparalleled luxury and a serene lifestyle. These ultra-chic Independent floors, developed under the Deen Dayal Jan Awas Yojana, provide an affordable yet luxurious option for those seeking a plotted development in Karnal. Designed to global standards by renowned architect Padmabhushan Hafeez Contractor, these classically-styled homes boast intricate detailing and thoughtful touches, creating magnificent residences to be proud of.

Located within a housing society, these low-rise premium apartments redefine elegance and sophistication. The community features a central lavish green zone with landscaped gardens, providing a vibrant and refreshing environment. Karnal’s cleanliness and selection as a smart city under the Smart Cities Mission contribute to its promising future in real estate development.



Infrastructural Development

Sunrise Premium Floors offers a distinctive advantage with its key feature of incorporating state-of-the-art imported aluminum formwork technology setting it apart from other projects in the market. The emphasis here is on a classical theme, and the structures are designed to be earthquake resistant. The on-site amenities of Sunrise Premium Floors are extensive, including a jogging track, gated community, thematic garden, convenient shopping plaza within the compound, colorful hedge plantation, jogging track, thematic plantation, classical sculptures garden, amphitheater, entrance water feature with bubblers, senior citizens’ sitting area, multipurpose event lawn, children’s play area, multisport court, reflexology path, and more. Additionally, there is a convenient shopping plaza within the compound to cater to all household needs.


Location Advantage

Sunrise Premium Floors is not only known for its exceptional features but also for its prime location, which boasts excellent proximity to reputable schools and hospitals. Situated in Sector 35, one of Karnal’s well-established and inhabited areas, Sunrise Premium Floors is surrounded by developed areas such as Sector 32, Sector 33, Sector 37, Sector 45, and Tikri.

The presence of renowned schools nearby ensures that families residing in Sunrise Premium Floors have access to quality education for their children. Additionally, the availability of reputable hospitals in close vicinity is a significant advantage for residents. In case of any medical emergencies or routine healthcare needs, prompt and reliable medical services are easily accessible.

Living in Sunrise Premium Floors not only offers a luxurious and comfortable lifestyle but also provides peace of mind, knowing that essential amenities like schools and hospitals are conveniently located nearby. The seamless access to quality education and healthcare facilities further enhances the appeal of this exceptional residential community.


Schools Nearby

  • J.P Public School
  • Azad High School
  • Little Angels Public School.

Hospitals Nearby

  • Kalpana Chawla Hospital
  • Sabharwal Hospital
  • Tagore Hospital
  • Noor Medical Centre

With its prime location and a range of amenities, Sunrise Premium Floors is poised to become the preferred destination for discerning homebuyers in Karnal.

Sunrise Premium Floors offers an unmatched lifestyle of luxury and tranquility in the historic city of Karnal. With its thoughtfully designed low-rise premium apartments, exquisite amenities, and prime location, it presents a unique paradise waiting to be discovered. Experience the epitome of serenity, comfort, class, and a convenient metropolitan lifestyle within a healthy living environment. Discover a new standard of living at Sunrise Premium Floors.
